protocol.name: P-GSE55906-1
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with LIMMA package of Bioconductor using GC-RMA normalization procedure. ID_REF =  VALUE = GCRMA-normalized log2 expression signal

protocol.name: P-GSE55906-2
protocol.text: Cold treatment was for 24 h at 4⁰C under constant light of ~35 µmol m-2 sec-1

protocol.name: P-GSE55906-3
protocol.text: Plants were grown on Gamborg's B-5 medium solidified with agar at 22⁰C under constant light at ~100 μmol m-2 sec-1 for 11 d

protocol.name: P-GSE55906-4
protocol.text: RNA was extracted using the RNeasy plant mini kit (Qiagen)

protocol.name: P-GSE55906-5
protocol.text: RNA was amplified and biotinylated using a MessageAmp kit (Ambion) according to the manufacturer's protocol

protocol.name: P-GSE55906-6
protocol.text: Hybridization and washing were carried out according to the Gene Chip manufacturer's protocol (Affymetrix)

protocol.name: P-GSE55906-7
protocol.text: Scan protocols were carried out according to the Gene Chip manufacturer's protocol (Affymetrix)
